title: Optimize Underground Development
description: A planning engineer optimizes the layout of access tunnels (development) in an underground mine to minimize cost while providing access to all planned stopes.

tasks.description: Import the final stope designs for the section of the mine to be developed.
tasks.expected_outcome: All target ore bodies (stopes) are loaded into the design software.

tasks.description: Use an automated tool to generate a network of development tunnels that connects all the stopes.
tasks.expected_outcome: A preliminary network of access tunnels is created.

tasks.description: Analyze the generated network and manually refine it to ensure it is practical and meets all design constraints.
tasks.expected_outcome: A final, cost-effective, and practical development design is produced.
